channel.title: Skate Muzik
channel.description: Milan's G. Quagliano repurposes the soundtracks of classic skate videos to create hour long mixes for your listening pleasure.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Milan's G. Quagliano repurposes the soundtracks of classic skate videos to create hour long mixes for your listening pleasure.
channel.itunes:summary: Milan's G. Quagliano repurposes the soundtracks of classic skate videos to create hour long mixes for your listening pleasure.
channel.itunes:keywords: nts-radio, nts, radio, skate, muzik, skate-muzik, milan, italy
channel.itunes:author: G. Quagliano

item.title: Skate Muzik - 24th September 2021
item.description:
https://www.nts.live/shows/skate-muzik/episodes/skate-muzik-24th-september-2021
This episode features the soundtrack of a super iconic skate video by shoes company Etnies, called High 5. The video was released in 1995 and launched the career of one of the Uk's (and worldwide) best skateboarder to date, Tom Penny.

item.title: Skate Muzik - Sergej Vutuc Special - 25th October 2019
item.description: Sergej was born in Bosnia in 1979, he is one of a kind, and just recently he contributed to Thomas Campbell latest film "Ya Olde Destruction" & designed a skateboard deck for Magenta skateboards but by the time you'll read this it's gonna be old news cause he's constantly working on something new no matter if printing zines, performing live, taking pictures or the 3 together.

item.title: Skate Muzik - 12th May 2019
item.description:
Milan's G. Quagliano repurposes the soundtracks of classic skate videos to create hour long mixes for your listening pleasure.

Manolo is a very well know video editor in the skate community, he remixes existing video parts and also creates "best of" parts of his favorite pro skateboarders, re-editing the music and using footage from different skate videos. This is why he calls them "mixtapes".

item.title: Skate Muzik Ep.6 Feat. Peter Bici - May 17th, 2017
item.description: null

item.title: Skate Muzik #6 w/ Peter Bici
item.description:
In 1994 Supreme opened up his doors on LaFayette St. in New York City, the same year Larry Clark filmed the movie "Kids" with a casting mainly composed of skateboarders and street kids that gravitated around the store.
Peter Bici, pro skateboarder, OG Supreme team member and producer of the "The Kids" documentary, sits down with Skate Muzik to take a trip down memory lane and also to reveal his present and future goals, on the notes of "A Love Supreme" by John Coltrane, the same musical masterpiece that director Thomas Campbell used in 1995 as the soundtrack for the first Supreme film starring Bici himself, Justin Pierce (R.I.P.), Giovanni Estevez, Jones Keeffe, Ryan Hickey.
Official Skate Muzik website: http://skatemuzikmilano.it

item.title: Skate Muzik (Jazz Special) - 12th May 2017
item.description: FRIDAY / 2PM-3PM /

item.title: Skate Muzik #5 w/ Jeff Pang
item.description:
The Zoo York Mixtape came out in 1997 establishing New York City as a skateboarding mecca, showcasing the talent and rawness of skateboarder destined to shape the future of street skating for years to come: Jeff Pang, Peter Bici, Harold Hunter, Danny Supa, Robbie Gangemi and more. In the 5th episode of Skate Muzik, Jeff Pang talks to G.Quagliano about this game-changing video, its incredible soundtrack entirely recorded live during Stretch Armstrong and Bobbito Show, and a lot more.
More on http://skatemuzikmilano.it

item.title: Skate Muzik - 24th March 2017
item.description: FRIDAY / 2PM-3PM / ONE OFF

item.title: Skate Muzik #4 w/ Gino Iannucci
item.description: A huge amount of skateboarders all over the globe consider Gino Iannucci the epitome of style and his 20+ years career speaks for itself. His Trilogy video part from 1996 is excellence and in the fourth installment of SkateMuzik, he sits down with G.Quagliano for the realest talk ever.

item.title: Skate Muzik #3 w/ Brendon Babenzien
item.description:
Powell-Peralta's "Bones Brigade Video Show" came out in 1984 featuring the company's legendary team in their prime: Tony Hawk, Lance Mountain, Rodney Mullen, Steve Caballero, Mike McGill, just to name a few. In SkateMuzik #3, Brendon Babenzien, former Supreme's creative director and owner of Noah NYC, talks about the iconic video, its soundtrack, and the way skateboarding affected his life.

Artwork by Yuri Kaban
http://cargocollective.com/yurikaban/

item.title: Skate Muzik ep. 2 feat. Chicoria
item.description: In SkateMuzik ep.2, the legendary Chicoria talks about World Industries' 20 Shot Sequence, the skate video from 1995 that got him into hip hop. Take a trip down memory lane and than go skate!

item.title: Skate Muzik Ep.1: Cherry
item.description:
Being a skateboarder and a music lover all his life, G.Quagliano decided to put together his favorite skate videos soundtracks for you to listen to and ride with.
With the child of the 90's that he is, we will take you on a journey through the history of those life changing art forms: skateboarding and music.

Current episode is based on Supreme's Cherry (2014) and features commentary by Roxanne Oldham, who along with director William Strobeck worked as musical supervisor for the project.
